languages.text: "Уважаем{mf|ый|ая} госпо{mf|дин|жа} фон Валанциус, я не знаю, кто убедил вас, что Инквизиция не расстреливает идиотов. Но я заверяю вас, что это не так. Поэтому прошу вас, перестаньте изображать из себя идиот{mf|а|ку}. Не дай Император я поверю".

"My esteemed {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius, I do not know who gave you the impression that the Inquisition does not shoot idiots, but I assure you, you have been falsely informed. So I request that you stop playing the fool. Emperor knows I won't believe it for a moment."
languages.original_text: "Уважаем{mf|ый|ая} госпо{mf|дин|жа} фон Валанциус, я не знаю, кто убедил вас, что Инквизиция не расстреливает идиотов. Но я заверяю вас, что это не так. Поэтому прошу вас, перестаньте изображать из себя идиот{mf|а|ку}. Не дай Император я поверю".

traits.locale_text: "My esteemed {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius, I do not know who gave you the impression that the Inquisition does not shoot idiots, but I assure you, you have been falsely informed. So I request that you stop playing the fool. Emperor knows I won't believe it for a moment."

"My esteemed {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius, I do not know who gave you the impression that the Inquisition does not shoot idiots, but I assure you, you have been falsely informed. So I request that you stop playing the fool. Emperor knows I won't believe it for a moment."

"My esteemed {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius, I do not know who gave you the impression that the Inquisition does not shoot idiots, but I assure you, you have been falsely informed. So I request that you stop playing the fool. Emperor knows I won't believe it for a moment."

"My esteemed {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius, I do not know who gave you the impression that the Inquisition does not shoot idiots, but I assure you, you have been falsely informed. So I request that you stop playing the fool. Emperor knows I won't believe it for a moment."

languages.text: “我尊贵的冯·瓦兰修斯{mf|领主|女士}，我不知道是谁告诉你，说审判庭不会枪毙白痴，但我可以向你保证，你一定是被误导了。所以我请求你，不要再装疯卖傻了。帝皇知道，你的把戏我一丁点都不相信。”
languages.original_text: "My esteemed {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius, I do not know who gave you the impression that the Inquisition does not shoot idiots, but I assure you, you have been falsely informed. So I request that you stop playing the fool. Emperor knows I won't believe it for a moment."

traits.locale_text: “我尊贵的冯·瓦兰修斯{mf|领主|女士}，我不知道是谁告诉你，说审判庭不会枪毙白痴，但我可以向你保证，你一定是被误导了。所以我请求你，不要再装疯卖傻了。帝皇知道，你的把戏我一丁点都不相信。”

languages.text: «Mi estimad{mf|o|a} {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius, no sé quién le ha inducido a creer que en la Inquisición no fusilamos a los idiotas, pero le aseguro que esa información es falsa. Así que deje de hacerse {mf|el tonto|la tonta}. Bien sabe el Emperador que no me lo creo».
languages.original_text: "My esteemed {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius, I do not know who gave you the impression that the Inquisition does not shoot idiots, but I assure you, you have been falsely informed. So I request that you stop playing the fool. Emperor knows I won't believe it for a moment."

traits.locale_text: «Mi estimad{mf|o|a} {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius, no sé quién le ha inducido a creer que en la Inquisición no fusilamos a los idiotas, pero le aseguro que esa información es falsa. Así que deje de hacerse {mf|el tonto|la tonta}. Bien sabe el Emperador que no me lo creo».

languages.text: 「尊敬受けし{mf|ロード|レディ}・フォン・ヴァランシウスよ、愚か者は異端審問庁に撃たれないという印象を誰が与えたかは知らないが、私が保証しよう、それは偽の情報だ。そこでだ、愚者の真似事はやめてもらおうか。私はそのような振る舞いを一瞬たりとも信じないと、皇帝もご存知だ」
languages.original_text: "My esteemed {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius, I do not know who gave you the impression that the Inquisition does not shoot idiots, but I assure you, you have been falsely informed. So I request that you stop playing the fool. Emperor knows I won't believe it for a moment."

traits.locale_text: 「尊敬受けし{mf|ロード|レディ}・フォン・ヴァランシウスよ、愚か者は異端審問庁に撃たれないという印象を誰が与えたかは知らないが、私が保証しよう、それは偽の情報だ。そこでだ、愚者の真似事はやめてもらおうか。私はそのような振る舞いを一瞬たりとも信じないと、皇帝もご存知だ」

languages.original_text: "My esteemed {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius, I do not know who gave you the impression that the Inquisition does not shoot idiots, but I assure you, you have been falsely informed. So I request that you stop playing the fool. Emperor knows I won't believe it for a moment."

languages.text: "{mf|Geschätzter Lord|Geschätzte Lady} von Valancius, ich weiß nicht, wie Ihr zu dem Trugschluss kommt, die Inquisition würde Idioten nicht erschießen, aber ich versichere Euch, diese Information ist falsch. Ihr solltet daher aufhören, Euch dumm zu stellen. Der Imperator weiß, dass ich Euch das für keine Sekunde abnehme."
languages.original_text: "My esteemed {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius, I do not know who gave you the impression that the Inquisition does not shoot idiots, but I assure you, you have been falsely informed. So I request that you stop playing the fool. Emperor knows I won't believe it for a moment."

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Geschätzter Lord|Geschätzte Lady} von Valancius, ich weiß nicht, wie Ihr zu dem Trugschluss kommt, die Inquisition würde Idioten nicht erschießen, aber ich versichere Euch, diese Information ist falsch. Ihr solltet daher aufhören, Euch dumm zu stellen. Der Imperator weiß, dass ich Euch das für keine Sekunde abnehme."

languages.text: « Très {mf|estimé seigneur|estimée dame} von Valancius, j'ignore d'où vous vient l'impression que l'Inquisition épargne les simples d'esprit, mais si tel est le cas, sachez que vous êtes bien mal {mf|renseigné|renseignée}. Je vous demande donc de cesser de faire l'{mf|idiot|idiote} séance tenante. Je ne suis pas crédule à ce point, l'Empereur m'en soit témoin. »
languages.original_text: "My esteemed {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius, I do not know who gave you the impression that the Inquisition does not shoot idiots, but I assure you, you have been falsely informed. So I request that you stop playing the fool. Emperor knows I won't believe it for a moment."

traits.locale_text: « Très {mf|estimé seigneur|estimée dame} von Valancius, j'ignore d'où vous vient l'impression que l'Inquisition épargne les simples d'esprit, mais si tel est le cas, sachez que vous êtes bien mal {mf|renseigné|renseignée}. Je vous demande donc de cesser de faire l'{mf|idiot|idiote} séance tenante. Je ne suis pas crédule à ce point, l'Empereur m'en soit témoin. »

languages.text: "Pek değerli {mf|Lord|Leydi} von Valancius, sende Engizisyon'un aptalları vurmayacağı izlenimini yaratan kim oldu bilmiyorum ama seni temin ederim yanlış bilgilendirilmişsin. O nedenle aptala yatmayı bırakmanı rica ediyorum. İmparator biliyor ki bir anlığına bile olsa beni kandıramazsın."
languages.original_text: "My esteemed {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius, I do not know who gave you the impression that the Inquisition does not shoot idiots, but I assure you, you have been falsely informed. So I request that you stop playing the fool. Emperor knows I won't believe it for a moment."

traits.locale_text: "Pek değerli {mf|Lord|Leydi} von Valancius, sende Engizisyon'un aptalları vurmayacağı izlenimini yaratan kim oldu bilmiyorum ama seni temin ederim yanlış bilgilendirilmişsin. O nedenle aptala yatmayı bırakmanı rica ediyorum. İmparator biliyor ki bir anlığına bile olsa buna inanmayacağım."
